Medicine_98_r.News Finding:
CONCLUSIONS:

Our findings raise the prospect that the tissues harvested from equine ligaments up to 72 hours of post-mortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cells.
Medicine_98_r.Paper Finding: The present work is the first, in both animal and human, to show that tissues harvested from cadaveric ligaments up to 72 hours postmortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cell populations.
Medicine_98_r.News Context:
Furthermore, TEM analysis confirmed the stemness of EC-MSCs and identified some cells with a typical neuronal morphology. CONCLUSIONS:

Our findings raise the prospect that the tissues harvested from equine ligaments up to 72 hours of post-mortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cells. EC-MSCs could be a promising alternative source for tissue engineering and stem cell therapy in equine medicine.
Medicine_98_r.Paper Context: Taking these observations into account, fundamental and clinical research studies are now required to investigate whether MSCs isolated from equine cadavers are suitable, abundant, and readily available to be used in future clinical applications. The present work is the first, in both animal and human, to show that tissues harvested from cadaveric ligaments up to 72 hours postmortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cell populations. SLs were confirmed free of any damage following examination of the tissues both macroscopically and microscopically.
Medicine_98_r.text: ['Finding: CONCLUSIONS: Our findings raise the prospect that the tissues harvested from equine ligaments up to 72 hours of post-mortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cells.']
Medicine_98_r.displayed_text: Finding: CONCLUSIONS: Our findings raise the prospect that the tissues harvested from equine ligaments up to 72 hours of post-mortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cells.

Medicine_tweet_117_r.News Finding: Meta-analysis evaluating aspirin for primary prevention in cardiovascular disease – the double-edged sword: NNT 265  (to prevent CV mortality/nonfatal MI + stroke); NNH 210 (major bleeding). #JAMA #CVD
Medicine_tweet_117_r.Paper Finding: The current study demonstrates that the absolute risk reduction for cardiovascular events and absolute risk increase for major bleeding associated with aspirin use were of similar magnitude.
Medicine_tweet_117_r.News Context: Meta-analysis evaluating aspirin for primary prevention in cardiovascular disease – the double-edged sword: NNT 265  (to prevent CV mortality/nonfatal MI + stroke); NNH 210 (major bleeding). #JAMA #CVD
Medicine_tweet_117_r.Paper Context: 6 This study showed that when analysis was restricted to populations with observation-derived 10-year cardiovascular event rate estimates of 10% or more, aspirin use was associated with an absolute risk decrease of 0.51% (5% CI, 0.06%-0.3%) for the cardiovascular composite outcome, but an absolute risk increase of 0.64% (5% CI, 0.35%-0.7%) for major bleeding. The current study demonstrates that the absolute risk reduction for cardiovascular events and absolute risk increase for major bleeding associated with aspirin use were of similar magnitude. Aspirin use was not associated with a reduction in cardiovascular mortality, and deaths due to bleeding were rare.
Medicine_tweet_117_r.text: ['Finding: Meta-analysis evaluating aspirin for primary prevention in cardiovascular disease – the double-edged sword: NNT 265 (to prevent CV mortality/nonfatal MI + stroke); NNH 210 (major bleeding). #JAMA #CVD\n ']
Medicine_tweet_117_r.displayed_text: Finding: Meta-analysis evaluating aspirin for primary prevention in cardiovascular disease – the double-edged sword: NNT 265 (to prevent CV mortality/nonfatal MI + stroke); NNH 210 (major bleeding). #JAMA #CVD

Medicine_66_r.News Finding: We further found that PC increased H2S production rate and CSE expressions, and protected young hearts from I/R-induced cardiomyocytes damage, all of which were disappeared in the aging hearts.
Medicine_66_r.Paper Finding: Taken together, our results indicated that aging rat hearts suffered from I/R injury and PC did not improve this injury.
Medicine_66_r.News Context: I/R also increased the release of cytochrome c and down-regulated the phosphorylation of PI3K, Akt and GSK-3b in the aging rat hearts. We further found that PC increased H2S production rate and CSE expressions, and protected young hearts from I/R-induced cardiomyocytes damage, all of which were disappeared in the aging hearts. Supply of NaHS not only increased PC-induced cardioprotection in the young hearts, but also lightened I/R induced-myocardial damage and significantly recovered the cardioprotective role of PC against I/R induced myocardial damage in the aging hearts.
Medicine_66_r.Paper Context: PC did not change the above mentioned indexes in comparison with the I/R (Figures 3, 4, 5 and 6 ). Taken together, our results indicated that aging rat hearts suffered from I/R injury and PC did not improve this injury. H 2 S produced by CSE in cardiovascular system acted as a physiological cardiac function regulator, which protected the cardiac function in ischemic reperfusion or hypoxia .
Medicine_66_r.text: ['Finding: We further found that PC increased H2S production rate and CSE expressions, and protected young hearts from I/R-induced cardiomyocytes damage, all of which were disappeared in the aging hearts.']
Medicine_66_r.displayed_text: Finding: We further found that PC increased H2S production rate and CSE expressions, and protected young hearts from I/R-induced cardiomyocytes damage, all of which were disappeared in the aging hearts.

Medicine_tweet_49_r.News Finding: Lianas reduce tropical forests' #carbon accumulation and storage   #TheTarzanEffect
Medicine_tweet_49_r.Paper Finding: This study is the first direct demonstration of liana effects at the ecosystem scale and illustrates the important role of lianas in tropical forests, particularly with respect to carbon budgets.
Medicine_tweet_49_r.News Context: Lianas reduce tropical forests' #carbon accumulation and storage   #TheTarzanEffect
Medicine_tweet_49_r.Paper Context: By impacting on tree growth and survival, lianas impact the carbon balance of these forests. This study is the first direct demonstration of liana effects at the ecosystem scale and illustrates the important role of lianas in tropical forests, particularly with respect to carbon budgets. Lianas are increasing in biomass and productivity throughout the tropics, and thus our findings have even greater relevance in terms of the fate of the tropical carbon balance, as well as for global atmospheric CO 2 levels, in a changing climate.
Medicine_tweet_49_r.text: ['Finding: Lianas reduce tropical forests\' #carbon accumulation and storage #TheTarzanEffect']
Medicine_tweet_49_r.displayed_text: Finding: Lianas reduce tropical forests' #carbon accumulation and storage #TheTarzanEffect

Medicine_125_r.News Finding: The study also revealed that despite sometimes being separated by hundreds of miles, resistant bedbug colonies utilized many of the same genes to protect themselves against pyrethroid insecticides.
Medicine_125_r.Paper Finding: Our data showed that multiple mechanisms involved in pyrethroid resistance is not only a phenomenon occurring in laboratory bed bug strains but also is widespread in naturally occurring bed bug populations (Figs.
Medicine_125_r.News Context:
Insecticide Armor

Further investigation revealed that all of these "overexpressed" genes were active in the tough outer shell of resistant bedbugs, and either helped neutralize pyrethroid insecticides before they could take effect or prevented them from entering the insects' bodies in the first place. The study also revealed that despite sometimes being separated by hundreds of miles, resistant bedbug colonies utilized many of the same genes to protect themselves against pyrethroid insecticides. Bedbugs by themselves aren't very mobile, but Haynes suspects the bugs are catching rides with humansaor rather, their furniture.
Medicine_125_r.Paper Context: 3D) is also interesting and further research is required to understand functional significance of this observation. Our data showed that multiple mechanisms involved in pyrethroid resistance is not only a phenomenon occurring in laboratory bed bug strains but also is widespread in naturally occurring bed bug populations (Figs. Inactivation of four P450 target genes significantly enhanced the susceptibility of resistant bed bugs to pyrethroid insecticide, which further confirmed the involvement of P450-mediated metabolic detoxification in pyrethroid resistance of bed bugs.

Medicine_337_r.News Finding: They found that the two methods are comparable in accuracy when checked against actual survey-based census data, but estimates from mobile phone data can provide more timely information, down to the hours.
Medicine_337_r.Paper Finding: This study demonstrates how data collected by mobile phone network operators can costeffectively provide accurate and detailed maps of population distribution over national scales and any time period while guaranteeing phone users' privacy.
Medicine_337_r.News Context: During the holiday season, populations in cities dropped sharply, while tourist sites such as coastlines and Disneyland Paris boomed. They found that the two methods are comparable in accuracy when checked against actual survey-based census data, but estimates from mobile phone data can provide more timely information, down to the hours. To apply it in other countries, the team would need to adjust the model to account for diverse mobile phone usage patterns.
Medicine_337_r.Paper Context: The global MP penetration Significance Knowing where people are is critical for accurate impact assessments and intervention planning, particularly those focused on population health, food security, climate change, conflicts, and natural disasters. This study demonstrates how data collected by mobile phone network operators can costeffectively provide accurate and detailed maps of population distribution over national scales and any time period while guaranteeing phone users' privacy. The methods outlined may be applied to estimate human population densities in lowincome countries where data on population distributions may be scarce, outdated, and unreliable, or to estimate temporal variations in population density.
Medicine_337_r.text: ['Finding: They found that the two methods are comparable in accuracy when checked against actual survey-based census data, but estimates from mobile phone data can provide more timely information, down to the hours.']
Medicine_337_r.displayed_text: Finding: They found that the two methods are comparable in accuracy when checked against actual survey-based census data, but estimates from mobile phone data can provide more timely information, down to the hours.
